key_commands.description: Lists all pods in the test-social-network namespace to identify any pods not running (e.g., Pending).
Describes the Pending pod to view scheduling conditions, events, and nodeSelector causing scheduling failure.
Lists available nodes and roles to verify that the target node specified by the selector does not exist and to check taints.

key_commands.command: exec_shell("kubectl get deploy user-service -n test-social-network -o yaml")
key_commands.description: Retrieves the Deployment spec to confirm the nodeSelector forcing scheduling to a non-existent node (kubernetes.io/hostname=extra-node).
key_commands.original_command: exec_shell("kubectl get deploy user-service -n test-social-network -o yaml")
